Class Filenaming

java.lang.Object
io.crums.sldg.db.Filenaming
public class Filenaming
extends java.lang.Object
The file naming convention.

      public java.lang.String normalizeNuggetFilename​(java.lang.String input, Format format)

      public java.lang.String normalizePathFilename​(java.lang.String input, Format format)
